entries.must_be_in_building: The plant must be in a building which you administrate.
entries.too_much_nutrients: The plant's soil is already filled with nutrients.
entries.too_much_water: The plant's soil is already saturated with water.
entries.apply_water: You apply water to the plant.
entries.apply_nutrients: You apply nutrients to the plant.
entries.not_enough_resource: You don't have enough resources of this type to apply to the plant.
entries.plant_stage_1_d: A small Aurilian plant.  These plants are notoriously difficult to grow and maintain.   Each plant is unique in its requirements and these requirements often change over the lifecycle.  When cared for properly, the plants have been known to bear fruit with miraculous properties.
entries.plant_stage_2_d: An Aurilian plant.  These plants are notoriously difficult to grow and maintain.   Each plant is unique in its requirements and these requirements often change over the lifecycle.  When cared for properly, the plants have been known to bear fruit with miraculous properties.
entries.plant_stage_3_d: A large Aurilian plant.  These plants are notoriously difficult to grow and maintain.   Each plant is unique in its requirements and these requirements often change over the lifecycle.  When cared for properly, the plants have been known to bear fruit with miraculous properties.
entries.plant_stage_dead_d: A dead Aurilian plant.  It has degraded beyond all hope.
entries.remove_nutrients: You remove nutrients from the plant.
entries.remove_water: You drain water from the plant.
entries.select_resource_body: Select what you wish to add to the plant.
entries.no_inventory: You do not have any inventory space.
entries.pick_fruit: You pick a piece of fruit from the plant.
